function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Biodiversity conservation deprioritized post-pandemic","Impact":"Lack of funding for biodiversity conservation, potential further biodiversity loss","Mitigation":"Raise awareness on the importance of biodiversity conservation, advocate for funding allocation","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, conservationists, environmentalists","Owner":"Conservation organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Impacts of delayed projects and funding cuts","Impact":"Scaled back or delayed projects, tight funds for conservation initiatives","Mitigation":"Seek alternative funding sources, prioritize urgent conservation projects","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Project teams, conservation organizations","Owner":"Project managers, conservation organizations"},{"Description":"Need for holistic approaches to address zoonotic transmission and biodiversity loss","Impact":"Lack of understanding of zoonotic transmission, public health consequences of biodiversity loss","Mitigation":"Promote One Health approach, enhance research and partnerships","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Research institutions, development agencies, government","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"}]}
